verses.roman:
vākye kahe, 'muñi caitanyera anucara'
muñi tāṅra bhakta--mane bhāve nirantara

synonyms: vākye—by words; kahe—He says; muñi—I am; caitanyera anucara—a follower of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; muñi—I; tāñra—His; bhakta—devotee; mane—in His mind; bhāve—in this condition; nirantara—always.
translation: By His words He declares, "I am a servant of Lord Caitanya." Thus with His mind He always thinks, "I am His devotee."
